content.div:
Kelly Clarkson may be known standing up for single gals everywhere with her breakup anthems, but the American Idol alum just revealed that she is no longer flying solo.

The 29-year-old’s Clarkson's love life -- or lack thereof -- has made almost as much headlines as her music, but the singer says she’s dating someone -- and has been for a while.

She confirmed the news during an interview with Toronto radio station CHFI 98.1, saying, “I do! I have a new boyfriend. Well, not a new one. I haven’t had…I haven’t dated in a while.”

Clarkson said she hasn’t been trying to keep the relationship under wraps; it’s just that no one had come right out and asked her if she was dating anyone (thanks Tish Iceton!). She explained on the morning show, “They’re just like, ‘we heard you’re engaged!’ and I’m like, ‘No, I’m not engaged,’ so I just haven’t actually given the whole truth.”

No word on who the lucky guy is, but let’s hope there are no more bitter breakup anthems in her immediate future.
